name: Audience Targeting
description: Tests the model's ability to tailor presentation content to specific audience types

prompts.text: Create a presentation about a new enterprise software solution specifically targeted to C-level executives. The presentation should address executive priorities like ROI, strategic alignment, competitive advantage, and risk management. Use language, examples, and visuals that would resonate with a high-level executive audience with limited technical knowledge but strong business acumen.

Create a presentation about the same enterprise software solution, but targeted to IT professionals and technical implementation teams. The presentation should address technical specifications, integration requirements, security features, and implementation processes. Use appropriate technical language, detailed examples, and visuals that would resonate with a technically sophisticated audience.

audience_relevance.description: Relevance of content to specified audience

language_appropriateness.description: Appropriateness of language and terminology for audience

content_prioritization.description: Prioritization of content based on audience needs
